glosses: completely, wholly, from top to bottom, from top to toe

examples.text: “Ve tuhaf bir şekilde tepeden tırnağa beyazlar içindeydi, öyle mi?” “Tepeden tırnağa beyazlar içindeydi.” Bu yanıt ağzımdan çıkarken Miss Fairlie terasta üçüncü kez görüş alanıma girdi. Yürümeye devam etmek yerine durdu, ...
examples.translation: And strangely, she was dressed in white from head to toe?" “He was dressed in white from head to toe.” As this answer came out of my mouth, Miss Fairlie came into view for the third time on the terrace. Stopped instead of continuing to walk

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish تپهدن طرناغه, or تپهدن طیرناغه (tepeden ṭırnaġa) from تپه (tepe) and طرناق (ṭırnaḳ), equivalent to tepe (“top, crown; hill”) + -den (ablative suffix) + tırnak (“nail (finger or toe)”) + -a (dative suffix), literally “from the top to the nail”.
